devdoc.author: Enzyme Council <security@enzyme.finance>
devdoc.details: Any arbitrary adapter is allowed by default, so all participants must be aware of their fund's configuration, especially whether they use a policy that only allows official adapters. Owners and asset managers must also establish trust for any arbitrary adapters that they interact with.

activateForFund(bool).details: Unimplemented by default, may be overridden.

deactivateForFund().details: Unimplemented by default, may be overridden.

getOwner().details: Ownership is deferred to the owner of the FundDeployer contract

params._actionId: An ID representing the desired action
params._callArgs: The encoded args for the action
params._caller: The user who called for this action

devdoc.title: IntegrationManager

activateForFund(bool).notice: Allows extension to run logic during fund activation

deactivateForFund().notice: Allows extension to run logic during fund deactivation (destruct)

getOwner().notice: Gets the owner of this contract

getVaultProxyForFund(address).notice: Gets the verified VaultProxy for a given ComptrollerProxy

receiveCallFromComptroller(address,uint2.notice: Receives a dispatched `callOnExtension` from a fund's ComptrollerProxy

setConfigForFund(address,address,bytes).notice: Enables the IntegrationManager to be used by a fund

userdoc.notice: Extension to handle DeFi integration actions for funds
